title: hunt for gollum available for pre oder uk

comments.content: dont know whether uk guys have seen this , maelstrom games are giving pre orders for 28/05/11 at  £10.79 delivered,  thinking of ordering them to get them asap when the are out
That site appears to be broken for me (IE9). As soon as I click on a link my basket is empty and I'm logged out.

Curious as to where that info came from.  As friends with people who run other shops in the UK (online and FLGS) and know people who work at the distributors, nobody there has heard anything about a date yet.   Of course, 28th May could be right, but I've been unable to confirm it at my sources.

If it is right, I need new sources :) [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_smile.png]
so the link doesnt work? havnt tried it myself, dont want to commit to something that might end up me getting it later than otherwise

Amazon UK have it on their site, but no full date, just June 2011.

http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lord-Rings-Lcg-Gollum-Adventure/dp/1616611014/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1305136419&sr=1-2 [http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lord-Rings-Lcg-Gollum-Adventure/dp/1616611014/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1305136419&sr=1-2]

so the link doesnt work? havnt tried it myself, dont want to commit to something that might end up me getting it later than otherwise

 



 

I mean a link at their site, as in "check out" etc.
